author: COMSOL
description: The Oldroyd-B fluid presents one of the simplest constitutive relations capable of describing the viscoelastic behavior of dilute polymeric solutions under general flow conditions. This example simulates a flow of such fluid past a cylinder between two parallel plates.
label: cylinder_flow_viscoelastic.mph
name: root
